member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using a dictionary of configured settings.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class to use a specific connection string for conencting to the database.

member.summary: Logs an error in log for the application.

member.name: M:Elmah.MySqlErrorLog.GetError(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a single application error from log given its identifier, or null if it does not exist.

member.name: M:Elmah.MySqlErrorLog.GetErrors(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Retrieves a page of application errors from the log in descending order of logged time.

member.summary: Gets the connection string from the given configuration dictionary.

member.summary: Get the name of this error log implemntation.

member.name: P:Elmah.MySqlErrorLog.ConnectionString
